about.title: WHO ARE WE?
about.text: S.P.R.I.Te. stands for â€œStudenti Polo Romagnolo in Informatica e Tecnologieâ€ (Romagnolo Pole Students in Computer Science and Technologies). The association was founded in the '90s to meet the needs of a group of students who wanted to expand the range of services for university students at the Cesena Campus. More than twenty years after its inception, the S.P.R.I.Te. Association boasts a long list of organized activities and an increasingly broad participation from students of Degree Courses and Faculties in the city of Cesena. You can join too if you want!
